{{ja-kanjitab|せん|しん|こく|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=せんしんこく|先進|tr1=senshin|t1=forefront, vanguard, advancement|国|tr2=koku|t2=country}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|せ|んし|んこく}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[sẽ̞ɴɕĩŋko̞kɯᵝ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|せんしん こく}}

# [[advanced]] country, [[developed]] country

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|先進国首脳会議|せんしん こく しゅのう かいぎ}}: the [[G7]], prior to inclusion of less-economically-strong Russia to form the [[G8]]

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|新興国|しんこう こく}}: newly [[industrialized]] country
* {{ja-r|発展途上国|はってん とじょう こく}}: [[developing]] country
* {{ja-r|途上国|とじょう こく}}: [[developing]] country
* {{ja-r|低開発国|てい かいはつ こく}} [[developing]] country {{qualifier|literally, ''“low-development country”}}
* {{ja-r|後進国|こうしん こく}} [[developing]] country {{qualifier|less common; literally, ''“backward country”}}
